programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening in Brickabuild. Clockwork Mouse is giving all sorts of confusing orders to the builders and everything is chaos. Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on her clockwork key and it's making her run slowly. Noddy decides to investigate and find out who could have tried to damage the little mouse. Following all the clues and keeping track of all the evidence in his WhoWhatWhere Tablet, Noddy finds that the trail leads him to Carlton! But Carlton adores Clockwork Mouse! Noddy discovers that poor Carlton didn't meant to damage her; he just wanted to help her rest and not work so hard. Noddy has a brilliant idea. If Clockwork Mouse and Carlton work together, they can get all their jobs finished in half the time. And then there'll be plenty of time to rest – and play! Good idea Noddy!

Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless “Heart of Fire Ruby” a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol
programme.desc: Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Shrek the Halls
programme.desc: Shrek's plans for a cozy family celebration spirals into one truly unforgettable Christmas.

programme.title: Donkey's Caroling Christmas-Tacular
programme.desc: Deck the halls with Donkey's laughter in this all-new crazy and colorful collection of animated Christmas goodies and hilarious holiday surprises.

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf
programme.desc: The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost of Lord Farquaad
programme.desc: Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Hammy's Boomerang Adventure
programme.desc: RJ the raccoon produces a nature video, which turns out to be an excuse for him and the porcupine children to play pranks on Hammy the squirrel

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: World of Street Woman Fighter
programme.desc: The <Street Woman Fighter> series make a triumphant return on a global stage! 6 dance crews from different countries set to compete in an upgraded match to win the title of International Champion!

programme.title: World Dice Tour 3
programme.desc: A single dice roll sends our cast members on a wild ride around the globe. Prepare for jaw-dropping twists on the revamped game board and an epic scale that transforms every destination into a theme park!

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea 2
programme.desc: <Fresh off the Sea> returns with Season 2! Lim Ji-yeon and Lee Jae-wook join the crew to hit Korea's coast and explore local delicacies unique to the area.

programme.title: EXchange 3
programme.desc: Dating reality show <EXchange> is back with season 3! When the ex-couples reunite and start building relationships with each other, will they get back with their ex or date someone new?

programme.title: High School Mystery Club 3
programme.desc: <High School Mystery Club> is back with Season 3! The members transferred to a school haunted by uncanny stories for years, attempting to unravel the mysteries behind all paranormal occurrences.

programme.title: High School Mystery Club 3
programme.desc: <High School Mystery Club> is back with Season 3! The members transferred to a school haunted by uncanny stories for years, attempting to unravel the mysteries behind all paranormal occurrences.

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim

programme.title: Chansung's Cooking
programme.desc: 2PM’s Chansung will explore different restaurants, taste popular menus and recreate them with his own recipes!

programme.title: The Backpacker Chef 2
programme.desc: <The Backpacker Chef> is back! With more clients, more demanding environment and an upgraded backpack, how will Chef Paik take on challenges this time?

programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop and two American cops are onto a suspected harbor worker and are forced to team up when they discover that the suspect is a witness on the run from the CIA

programme.title: Tiger Cage 2
programme.desc: Gangsters pursue a Hong Kong lawman framed for murder and a lawyer they believe is linked to laundered money.

programme.title: The Policeman's Lineage
programme.desc: A criminal drama of the very different two policemen handling a huge case together shakes the police organization.

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: The story of keepers of the Warsaw Zoo who helped save hundreds of people and animals during the German invasion.

programme.title: Kiss And Spell
programme.desc: When a ghost-fearing magician falls for his staffer, who happens to be haunted by her dead best friend, he must face his fears while convincing her he'd make an excellent boyfriend.

programme.title: Our Season
programme.desc: A fantasy drama about the miraculous moment of a mother coming down from the Heavens on a 3-day vacation and staying beside her daughter.

programme.title: Escape Room
programme.desc: Six friends test their intelligence when an escape room they participate in takes a dark and twisted turn.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to to save the day when a mysterious white gas envelops an entire district in Seoul, South Korea.

programme.title: Police Story: Lockdown
programme.desc: A man looking for the release of a long-time prisoner takes a police officer, his daughter, and a group of strangers hostage.

programme.title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
programme.desc: The bodyguard, Michael Bryce, continues his friendship with assassin, Darius Kincaid, as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

programme.title: Default
programme.desc: A dramatization of the behind-the-scenes story of the IMF negotiations that took place during the financial crisis in 1997, through three parallel stories.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Visit Houston, Texas to try a next level, mouth watering burger that might be just the biggest one ever seen and a New York quintessential steakhouse sample their expertly cooked dry-aged porterhouse.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Sample some Japanese pho, lovingly prepared with precision. Then go to France through the amazing food we consume at a unique country chic, Palm Springs eatery.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Today, it’s all about Italian fare. Try some creative modern Italian food from a shop front in Hoboken in New Jersey and delicious pasta in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan
programme.desc: Adam Liaw discovers a host of delights in Japan. On the wintry northern island of Hokkaido, he samples sea urchin, pond smelt and boutique cheesecake.

programme.title: Leguizamo Does America
programme.desc: John meets up with renowned actor Michael Peña to learn about what it was like to grow up in the Midwest, while still attempting to retain his Mexican culture.

programme.title: Leguizamo Does America
programme.desc: John starts his travels by visiting with up-and-coming trans reggaeton artist, Villano Antillano, who is changing the face and the rules of the game with her music and her existence.

programme.title: Leguizamo Does America
programme.desc: John starts his trip by driving to east L.A. with native Angelino, George Lopez.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Great White Shark
programme.desc: Reptiles, amphibians, insects and fish are found in every corner of our world - and for this special group of animals, life is regulated by the sun.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Into the Cosmos: The Space Race, Mars And Beyond
programme.desc: A look at the development of space travel and the potential for humans to one day walk on the surface of Mars.

programme.title: Dinosaur Cold Case
programme.desc: It's called Borealopelta, a recently discovered, 110 million year old dinosaur that's so well preserved, it looks like it could've been walking the Earth just last month. Now, paleontologists at Canada's Royal Tyrrell Museum have taken on the roles of forensic detectives to determine where it came from, how it died, and why this land based creature wound up in an area that was once an inland sea.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2
programme.desc: Meet three actresses who became real-life princesses. Follow Grace Kelly, Gloria Swanson, and Rita Hayworth on their rise from Hollywood royalty to members of European nobility, which brought unparalleled glamour to the aristocracy.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2
programme.desc: Meet the “Queens of Culture”: three empowered American princesses who blazed trails through the international arts world. See how Winnaretta Singer, Sara Murphy, and Peggy Guggenheim inspired some of the most innovative artists of the 20th century.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2
programme.desc: Witness the tragic tales of Barbara Hutton, Clara Ward, and Kathleen “Kick” Kennedy, women of beauty, wealth and power who married into European nobility, but ended up shunned by society, family, and the happy endings they hoped to achieve.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2
programme.desc: Explore the impact three American women had on British fashion, interior design, and even Parliament. Nancy Astor, Nancy Lancaster, and Pauline de Rothschild made the voyage for different reasons, but each shared the desire to stand up and be heard.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along – they’re so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless “Heart of Fire Ruby” a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol
programme.desc: Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Shrek the Halls
programme.desc: Shrek's plans for a cozy family celebration spirals into one truly unforgettable Christmas.

programme.title: Donkey's Caroling Christmas-Tacular
programme.desc: Deck the halls with Donkey's laughter in this all-new crazy and colorful collection of animated Christmas goodies and hilarious holiday surprises.

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf
programme.desc: The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost of Lord Farquaad
programme.desc: Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Hammy's Boomerang Adventure
programme.desc: RJ the raccoon produces a nature video, which turns out to be an excuse for him and the porcupine children to play pranks on Hammy the squirrel

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.desc: Tip and Oh use Slushious as an inter-planetary taxi but Tip takes it too far; Smek becomes homeless and must accept Oh's help.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip gets carried away with Boov-tech and needs Oh's post office pals to save the day; Oh must participate in a ritual dance to become an adult Boov

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Peabody and Sherman try to do the show in a new city but end up on the moon instead and must get home before astronauts take over the penthouse

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Fleshed Out Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmare?he's turned into a human! Messy Business At The Manor When Mosshead has nowhere to go for vacation, Casper invites him to stay at his uncles' house…where he quickly discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening in Brickabuild. Clockwork Mouse is giving all sorts of confusing orders to the builders and everything is chaos. Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on her clockwork key and it's making her run slowly. Noddy decides to investigate and find out who could have tried to damage the little mouse. Following all the clues and keeping track of all the evidence in his WhoWhatWhere Tablet, Noddy finds that the trail leads him to Carlton! But Carlton adores Clockwork Mouse! Noddy discovers that poor Carlton didn't meant to damage her; he just wanted to help her rest and not work so hard. Noddy has a brilliant idea. If Clockwork Mouse and Carlton work together, they can get all their jobs finished in half the time. And then there'll be plenty of time to rest – and play! Good idea Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise… he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch break Gilber’s ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless “Heart of Fire Ruby” a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol
programme.desc: Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Shrek the Halls
programme.desc: Shrek's plans for a cozy family celebration spirals into one truly unforgettable Christmas.

programme.title: Donkey's Caroling Christmas-Tacular
programme.desc: Deck the halls with Donkey's laughter in this all-new crazy and colorful collection of animated Christmas goodies and hilarious holiday surprises.

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf
programme.desc: The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost of Lord Farquaad
programme.desc: Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Hammy's Boomerang Adventure
programme.desc: RJ the raccoon produces a nature video, which turns out to be an excuse for him and the porcupine children to play pranks on Hammy the squirrel

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimi’s not exactly who she says she is. Our villains’ alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Klaus is injured and Veruca’s mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Veruca’s rekindled powers.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero – but being “brave” quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
programme.desc: A generation's final journey begins when Captain Picard and the crew of the Enterprise encounter a monstrous alien race known as the Remans. Picard and his crew must risk everything to prevent this sinister villain from destroying Earth.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: After chimps infected with a deadly rage virus are freed, a global pandemic nearly wipes out humanity. A small group of survivors, led by Jim (Cillian Murphy), must navigate desolate London and find hope amidst the chaos.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Viola Davis stars in an action-packed story of an elite all-female unit of warriors determined to defend their nation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: In this most colorful and relaxed installment of Paramount's longest running series, Captain Picard leads his multicultural starship crew in a rebellion to save a planet from the very Federation they serve so proudly.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A tortured superhero crash-lands in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, and tries to revitalize himself by romancing an alluring housewife, causing chaos in the city.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Jurassic World Rebirth: The Making Of A New Era
programme.desc: Journey to the most dangerous place on Earth in this broadcast special that takes you behind-the-scenes of JURASSIC WORLD REBIRTH. The stars and filmmakers transport you from Thailand to Malta, revealing sets, stunts and dinosaurs that have never been seen before.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: Now the brothers must team up with April O'Neil and their new ally Casey Jones, to battle their enemies and face their biggest threat: the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Throughout history, many have sought the lost Ark of the Covenant. According to the Old Testament, God himself instructed Moses to build the Ark, and it is believed that it held the power of the Almighty.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: From the ancient Babylonians to modern day urban explorers, mankind has always been fascinated by abandoned places. What is the allure that draws us to these post-apocalyptic landscapes?

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: For nearly 70 years, Disney has pushed the boundaries of art and science through the work of a team of dreamers, designers, and builders known as the Imagineers.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The ancient Greeks built an empire that is considered the birthplace of Western Civilisation, and they credited their most monumental achievements to gods like Zeus, Apollo, and Poseidon.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: As time is running out, an exciting find in the swamp may have the fellowship rewriting the history of North America.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Past Alone participants Britt Ahart (Seasons 3 & 5), Jordan Jonas (Season 6 Winner) and Lucas Miller (Season 1) tackle one of their biggest challenges yet; building a massive Deadfall Trap.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Expert bushcrafters and former Alone participants Clay Hayes (Season 8), Callie North (Season 3) and Britt Ahart (Seasons 3 & 5) tackle the toughest challenge yet; building a working watercraft.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Kidd and Harry traverse through intense whitewater to reach the spawning grounds of steelhead trout. Jake loses his dogs after they follow lion tracks into remote and unfamiliar territory.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: The team launches an incredible nighttime 200-drone light show experiment above the Triangle and the East Field leading to a startling sighting in the sky and new data that points toward possible answers.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: The Landry's target the legendary beasts of Cow Island. Daniel sets an ambitious goal to catch 10 alligators over 10 feet long. Ashley gambles on a new hunting ground.

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: A Bedtime Routine
programme.desc: On those hot, humid summer nights, nothing can get in the way of sleep like mosquitoes on the hunt. We learn about the tools the Edo townspeople had at their disposal to fight the pesky insects.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from July 18, Day 6 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Nagoya.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Wrapping. In Japan the art of wrapping and tying is a culture displaying beauty and thoughtfulness. It elevates the content and shows care. Join us for a rediscovery of wrapping design.

programme.title: Viewpoint Science
programme.desc: The proactive science education program which encourages primary and lower secondary school children to discover and investigate the mysteries which puzzle them.

programme.title: Story Land
programme.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: We travel the Izumo Highway, which has been used since ages past, and meet people who value human connection, such as a magatama jewelry artisan and a pro wrestler learning farming in a village.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers
programme.desc: Gassan, revered as a sacred peak for 1,400 years, is where ancestral spirits are said to reside. Our explorer joins worshippers who climb to be with the dead.

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Osaka, a city that thrives on rivers, has faced countless flood damage. Find out the latest measures protecting the city from typhoons and heavy rain.

programme.title: Clothing That Protects
programme.desc: Morinaga Kunihiko (Fashion designer)visits Amami Oshima, Kagoshima. Priestesses on Amami wore patchwork robes with triangular butterfly designs, intended to protect the wearer from unseen spirits.

programme.title: Steve Jobs and Japan
programme.desc: Apple founder Steve Jobs revolutionized the way we live with his creations. And he loved Japanese culture. Close friends, colleagues and design experts shed new light on how this came to be.

programme.title: Documentary 360

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Tomorrow's Manga Masters

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: Haku. (an Osaka-based four-piece band praised for their unique lyrics and sound) and XinU (a smoky-voiced singer with a sound that blends diverse elements).

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-16.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Konnyaku is an important element of Japanese cuisine. It offers various health benefits and is drawing international attention. We learn about the many uses of this surprising superfood.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: On this unique trip around Japan, discover the lesser-known charms and customs of regions through the eyes of cats! Filmed by wildlife photographe,Iwago Mitsuaki.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: ANIME MANGA EXPLOSION
programme.desc: This episode features the hit mystery-entertainment series The Apothecary Diaries. We hear from the author and visit the anime studio to uncover the secrets behind its rich world and characters.

programme.title: Story Land in Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: The miners of Iwami Ginzan worked in darkness, risking their lives for fortune and glory. The area once produced quantities of silver yet had little impact on the beauty of the surrounding mountains.

programme.title: OKINAWA: US Influences
programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: US Influences.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from July 19, Day 7 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Nagoya.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The head Inari shrine has 30,000 subordinate shrines throughout Japan. Since its foundation in 711, the Inari deities attract worshippers with varying needs.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Today: making small talk with a client. Raphael Marso, from Germany, works at a company that makes manufacturing equipment. He takes on a roleplay challenge to help improve his Japanese skills.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: A popular tourist train in Kyushu's Takachiho area is powered by fuel made from leftover ramen soup! Starting from zero, trucking company owner Nishida Masumi developed his own biodiesel.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: It's the first day of school, and Sharkdog's not allowed to come; well, that's never stopped him before!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. A noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse. It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger is getting dressed for a special day with his Hummy Mummy.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Builder Cove needs a post office! Rubble & Crew use their construction skills to convert the super car wash and clean Farmer Zoe's sticky farm animals.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa loves cycling downhill but she’s not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and George’s teeth are lovely and clean. But George’s plastic toy “Mr Dinosaur” teeth are a bit yellow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain, they rush out to play together!

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away and Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef wants to make a special dish for every single friend coming to Fwendsgiving. The gang treks to The Other Side of the Fence so Olly can pick the first blueberry of the season.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef wants to make a special dish for every single friend coming to Fwendsgiving, but struggles to do it all in time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a magic potion turns Crusher into a chicken, it's up to Blaze and AJ to collect three incredible potion ingredients and change him back into a Monster Machine...Before he's a chicken forever!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: It's the Robot Championship - and only the fastest, strongest, smartest robot will win! Using coding, can Blaze win enough sports to take home the Robot Championship trophy?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol must save the day when two helpful robots take on more than they can handle. In a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a Prism that makes rainbows and drains Adventure Bay of color.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol springs into action when a digging machine goes out-of-control. Digi and Tal, try to help Mayor Humdinger but leave the Mayor covered in jam.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora helps Benny and Uni the Unicornasaurus get their magic paintbrush back so he can be reunited with his pet. Dora teams up with Hearty the Grumple so she can finally compete in the Grumple Games.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Vola, Goldie, Chucks, and Hank feel left out when they learn that Baby and William have been keeping a super secret. Fishy Force trains for their first big TV interview.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Dennis challenges the Sharkpack to a game of 3-on-3 basketball, Sharkdog reveals he's an amazing player. So amazing, he may end up taking Max's spot!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious cold, Max knows Dad will be able to help him feel better. But things go haywire when the aquarium's robot doctor takes over the examination!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 3
programme.desc: While the pressures of being in space starts to take its toll on Howard, Amy feels threatened when Sheldon hires a young female assistant, Alex (guest star MARGO HARSHMAN).

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 4
programme.desc: When Howard returns from space, he doesn’t get the hero’s welcome he expected. Meanwhile, Game Night turns into a battle of the sexes.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 5
programme.desc: The gang celebrates Halloween at Stuart’s comic book store. Meanwhile Leonard and Penny discover a new spark in their relationship when he seduces her with science.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 6
programme.desc: Sheldon’s tenuous relationship with renowned scientist STEPHEN HAWKING is threatened by a game of “Words with Friends,” while Penny secretly enrolls in a class at the local college.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 7
programme.desc: Bernadette pressures Howard to move out of his mother's house.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 9
programme.desc: The President chooses his Supreme Court nominee.

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the early 1960s, at the height of the Cold War, THE MAN FROM U.N.C.L.E. centers on CIA agent Solo (Man of Steel's Henry Cavill) and KGB agent Kuryakin (The Social Network's Armie Hammer). Forced to put aside longstanding hostilities, the two team up on a joint mission to stop a mysterious international criminal organization, which is bent on destabilizing the fragile balance of power through the proliferation of nuclear weapons and technology. The duo's only lead is the daughter of a vanished German scientist, who is the key to infiltrating the criminal organization, and they must race against time to find him and prevent a worldwide catastrophe.

programme.title: Barry Lyndon
programme.desc: Forced to leave Ireland after killing an English officer in a duel, handsome young Redmond Barry (O'Neal) seeks his fortune as a soldier in Prussia, as a spy then as a gambler living among the elite of Europe. He changes his name and marries an aristocrat (Berenson) for her wealth, but the acceptance he seeks finally eludes him.

programme.title: Smallville S1 5
programme.desc: Clark has a chance to share a night out on the town with Lana, thanks to Lex's matchmaking, but the evening is interrupted when Clark faces an icy enemy, Sean Kelvin (MICHAEL CORISTINE).

programme.title: Friends S5 1
programme.desc: Will Emily forgive Ross before their honeymoon? Monica and Chandler agree to end their new relationship.

programme.title: Friends S5 2
programme.desc: Ross' new wife won't speak to him. Rachel appoints Monica her advisor in romance. Phoebe feels neglected.

programme.title: Friends S5 3
programme.desc: While Phoebe delivers triplets, Joey experiences his own pain. Monica plans a date with a male nurse to spite Chandler.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 16
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr, and Sal are forced to get cheeky with interviewers and explain their lackluster resumes while trying to land a job at a mobile company. And tonight's loser witnesses a joining in matrimony that's anything but holy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 01
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q take their talents to Miami for the season premiere, pulling all new pranks on the beach. The guys zip around in scooters controlled by the other Jokers, and the loser will come face-to-face with an alligator.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 02
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q teach fencing, and one Joker is especially "en garde" when forced to face an Olympian. The guys trim away their dignity as hairstylists, and the punished Joker melts down during a presentation on climate change.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 03
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q host a team building seminar that's NOT safe for work, and later, they pose as caricature artists on a boardwalk. Plus, the wheels come off for tonight's loser as he faces a confused and unamused biker gang.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 04
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q hit the supermarket to mess with shoppers in an epic game of Hide-and-Sneak, the guys draw straws at a BBQ joint, and tonight's loser gets a bad case of stage fright while giving the performance of his life.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 23
programme.desc: When Sean is only allowed in the storage facility after hours, it results in the first ever day to night auction, ending in the dark! Will their flashlights illuminate big scores?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 24
programme.desc: Sean takes the bidders to the home of the L.A. County Fair for a behind the scenes tour. In a location that was built in 1922, there's no telling what might be up for auction. Who will win big underneath the grandstands?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 25
programme.desc: The bidders take a trip out to Hawaii for an auction at a marine life park. T-Money places his bet on what's in a locked cabinet, while Brandon and Lori smell a great deal with old medical equipment.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 26
programme.desc: Still in Hawaii, Sean takes the bidders deep into the island to hidden storage bunkers. Conflict arises between the locals and Sean's usual's, but who will be victorious?

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 1
programme.desc: Posing as a technician, Michael literally "gets the bug out" of a customer's phone and has him convinced it was in there all along. Then, as a seemingly ordinary bartender, he makes patrons fall for a never-ending beer bottle and a shot that breaks the laws of physics. Plus, he infiltrates an office and has gullible coworkers believing that he can freeze-dry animals and reanimate them.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 2
programme.desc: Posing as a cashier, Michael makes a shopper's face appear on a milk carton and tries to convince her that she really is a missing person. Then, in a shipping store he has customers believing that impossible technology of the future has arrived, likea bowling ball that can be mailed in a flat box. Plus, he has a hotel guest questioning her identity when he swaps her ID, and stumps a valet when he does a disappearing act from his car.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 3
programme.desc: Posing as a thrift store employee, Michael makes shoppers believe that a real waddling duck is just a lifelike decoy, and confuses clerks with a never-ending chain of hangers. Then, he convinces liquor store customers that some corks are made of cheese and a wine can freeze on command. Plus, in a museum he shocks a gullible new employee by destroying a priceless piece then impossibly reconstructing it.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 4
programme.desc: Michael convinces car wash patrons that he broke their window, only to miraculously fix it with the push of a button. Then, dry cleaning customers are confused when Michael is suddenly wearing their clothes in the blink of an eye. Plus, he has pet store shoppers convinced that they're seeing multiple fish in an empty water bowl.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 5
programme.desc: Michael convinces customers to buy toys that couldn't possibly exist, like bubbles that turn into Christmas ornaments when you catch them. Then, as a personal trainer, he makes a client think he actually sweat enough to fill a bucket. Plus, a security guard panics when Michael makes a car disappear on his watch.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 6
programme.desc: At a sporting goods store, a confused customer debates the laws of physics with Michael after he suddenly makes a lightweight box impossibly heavy. Then as a barista, Michael shows caf� patrons that glass is not nearly as impenetrable as it seems. Plus, he spooks museum workers when he shows that boomerangs really do always come back, and that taxidermy is a less than permanent solution.

programme.title: Smallville S1 6
programme.desc: Clark is wracked with haunting visions when he meets an old woman, Cassandra Carpenter (JACKIE BURROUGHS), who can see the future.

programme.title: Sphere
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman, Sharon Stone and Samuel L. Jackson star as a group of scientists recruited by the Navy to conduct a secret underwater mission to explore an alien spaceship.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 10
programme.desc: Leo may have to resign because of his past substance abuse.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 20
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test their craziest hack yet: cooking a three-course meal under the hood of a car…while driving! Plus, Kevin finds out who can spot his fresh breath hack, and one family spends three months living in a Hack House.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 19 - Sydney Swans v North Melbourne
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 200
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 19 - Carlton v North Melborne
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 7
programme.desc: Jess and the team arrive in Mumbai, soaking in the city's vibrant culture. Split up along the way, they reunite in Jaisalmer where they experience quintessential Rajasthan riding across the iconic dunes of the Thar Desert.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Dampier Peninsula, Litchfield, Menindee
programme.desc: Ernie learns to catch crab the Kimberley way up in Dampier Peninsula, Aaron takes to the skies of Litchfield National Park and Bianca spends time on Country with a Barkindji artist.

programme.title: Asia News Week - Episode 26
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus what's trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition - Episode 21
programme.desc: Join John Barron and Chas Licciardello as they take a deeper look at the people, issues and politics driving America this week. Plus longer interviews and in-depth discussions on the second Trump presidency.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 27
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Khanh Ong's Wild Food - Episode 7
programme.desc: Chef Khanh Ong travels to Mallacoota, Victoria to explore the seafood delicacies that the area has to offer but decides to make a few pitstops along the way. He learns how to make blue cheese.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 7
programme.desc: Jess and the team arrive in Mumbai, soaking in the city's vibrant culture. Split up along the way, they reunite in Jaisalmer where they experience quintessential Rajasthan riding across the iconic dunes of the Thar Desert.

programme.title: Larapinta - Episode 5
programme.desc: Protecting language goes hand in hand with revitalising country, and the Pertame language school is teaching a new generation. Kevin Ungwunaka introduces Talia to Running Waters, where the battle for conservation is imminent.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia - 1980: Sir Robert Helpmann
programme.desc: In 1980, Michael Parkinson interviewed Sir Robert Helpmann in an extensive one on one chat.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Episode 24
programme.desc: The National Press Club hosts public debates and discussions that shape Australia now and into the future. Home to national conversations with decision-makers and influencers; driving the national debate forward.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 27
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Black Snow - Unfinished Business
programme.desc: In Ashford, residents gather at the local high school to unearth a time capsule from the 'class of 94'. Among the items is a letter from Isabel Baker who was murdered just a week before the time capsule was buried.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - Timor Leste's Protein Champions
programme.desc: With malnutrition rates amongst the highest in the world, we go behind the scenes of a popular cooking show in Timor Leste that demonstrates how to create delicious and affordable protein-packed meals.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 29
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday as Fauziah Ibrahim and Thomas Oriti bring you an engaging mix of the latest news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics, global affairs, culture and weather. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 29
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - Episode 25
programme.desc: As our newly-elected and re-elected members of parliament prepare to return to Canberra for the Opening of the 48th Parliament on Tuesday, David Speers and the panel preview the week. Plus the washup from Tasmania's election.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 24
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel cover the week in sport including the First Test between the Wallabies and the British and Irish Lions, plus the World Swimming Championships in Singapore, AFL, NRL, Super Netball, cricket and more.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 22
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: ABC News - Episode 58
programme.desc: Alex Thomas presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and up to date news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch - Episode 20
programme.desc: Bridget Brennan, James Glenday, Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy, Charles Brice and Nate Byrne hear from some of the guests who appeared on News Breakfast. Plus film critic Zak Hepburn and resident foodie Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 58
programme.desc: Alex Thomas presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and up to date news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 27
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Loving Gluten Free - Episode 3
programme.desc: Helen honours her Greek roots with a gluten free recipe for 'Lamb Pastitsio'. Kathy Tsaples, founder of 'Sweet Greek', shares her recipe for savoury tarts that have a delicious polenta pastry base.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 23
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 24
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel cover the week in sport including the First Test between the Wallabies and the British and Irish Lions, plus the World Swimming Championships in Singapore, AFL, NRL, Super Netball, cricket and more.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 19 - Collingwood v Fremantle
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: Confidence
programme.desc: Jake Vig is a con man with a gift for duplicity and a natural charm. Now he’s cooked up the con of a lifetime to even the score for the murder of a buddy, pay back those he owes, and get the hell out of the business while he’s still drawing breath.

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: After accidentally being left behind by boat staff, a vacationing couple find themselves stranded in the middle of the ocean, and at the mercy of a group of circling sharks.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Steve McQueen jumps on his motorcycle and leads the way in this thrill-packed adventure that blends top stars, a true-life WWII saga and Hollywood's gift for storytelling into a bravura, blockbuster film.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
