programme.title: Via Idra, Entre Terre Et Ciel
programme.desc: Our trek along the Via Idra continues from Campo Tencia to the Alpe Sponda mountain hut, and a spot of high altitude fishing! Then on from the Sponda hut to that of Cognora, in the Valle Verzasca and an opportunity to admire the Pizzo Barone.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: The Ritz: more than just a hotel, a global brand. All about the origins of the word ''Fashion''. Jerome Lair makes and restores stringed instruments. Wearing Klein blue. We join Texto Dallas in his studio, where he transforms nails into veritable works of art!

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: In the heart of the Marais district in Paris, the National Archives Museum hosts works dating back several centuries. French designer and architect Herve Van der Straeten opens the doors to his workshop. Style by Alessandro Michele for Valentino. We meet up with ceramic artist Alison Thirion.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The programme that (finally) explains the ins and outs of Swiss well-being, and offers the keys to understanding that renowned ''swiss attitude. A fun guide to Homo Helveticus, using archive footage from years past and recent times, all in a light-hearted, sunny mood with plenty of laughter thrown in.

programme.title: On Est Rendu La
programme.desc: Thomas, E?merick and Ariane keep active to assert themselves, assume their individuality and make the world of sport more open. They are the proof that sport is evolving in accordance with the values of young people today.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Adamo, Le Film De Sa Vie
programme.desc: In a journey full of intimacy and surprises, the life of Salvatore Adamo is recounted by seventeen of his fans. In the company of Bruno Tummers and Joelle Scoriels, seated in the front row of the Theâtre royal de Mons, the artist relives the highlights of his career, projected on the big screen.

programme.title: C'est Archive Pres De Chez Vous
programme.desc: Jean-Luc Fonck invites Salvatore Adamo to relive the 1960s through the magic of archive footage and images. With a 19 year-old FranCoise Hardy, the Rolling Stones in Brussels in 1964 plus Alain Delon and his wild ride with Marianne Faithfull.

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Everything is going wrong at the theatre: rehearsals are increasingly tense, the result of everyone's personal problems, and the selection date for the competition has finally been announced. But will they be ready in time?

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Wilfried, the drug dealer, could help Jacob, if Lionel is prepared to do something for him in return. With her mother, Emily finds an idea that could finally enable her to take part in the selection. When he discovers he hasn't been listened to, Emily's father takes a radical decision.

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: After managing to find her father's contact details, Nathalie decides to get in touch with him. Marianne, disappointed with the youngsters' lack of effort and application, has a complicated choice to make. Lionel's father's pays Nathalie a visit to explain that he had never offered his son sufficient support.

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Ambroise has to make a decision that is both responsible but also fatal. Lionel and Nathalie patch things up between them. It's time to leave for Guadeloupe and all four are buzzing with excitement. Nathalie makes the most of the trip to meet her father, accompanied by Lionel.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: The Ritz: more than just a hotel, a global brand. All about the origins of the word ''Fashion''. Jerome Lair makes and restores stringed instruments. Wearing Klein blue. We join Texto Dallas in his studio, where he transforms nails into veritable works of art!

programme.title: Jean-Michel Jarre - 14 Juillet Aux Francofolies De La Rochelle 2024
programme.desc: He is a visionary, avant-garde artist, a pioneer of electronic music. His original sounds and live performances have propelled him to the top international stages. His concerts attracted millions of spectators. For the first time, Jean-Michel Jarre performs at the Francofolies, bringing the festival to a fitting close.

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: In the heart of the Marais district in Paris, the National Archives Museum hosts works dating back several centuries. French designer and architect Herve Van der Straeten opens the doors to his workshop. Style by Alessandro Michele for Valentino. We meet up with ceramic artist Alison Thirion.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Les Secrets De La Foret De Nuages
programme.desc: Today under threat, cloud forests only make up 4% of the planet's woodland areas. These high altitude ecosystems, bathed in a thick blanket of fog, shelter exceptional levels of biodiversity. Twenty-five years ago, the French film-maker Philippe Molins fell in love with Los Yaltes, Ecuador. We discover its secrets.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Noir Comme Neige
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the rampage in the ski resort of Nobleval. Constance Vivier, French police officer with a high altitude unit, teams up with the Swiss policeman Andreas Meyer. After two bodies are found, the countdown is on to prevent more victims being added to the list.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Born in Senegal, Yacine Diouf joins her sister in Reunion Island in 1998 and lives there for nearly twenty years without papers, doing odd jobs. After regularizing her situation, she discovers her vocation as an energy healer and decides to offer this gift to sick people.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous !
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Felix and Manolo have been invited to a show but are given a detention. Flavie has to take a babysitting test, but she's caught out by Pierre-Charles who's rigged the dolls.

programme.title: Ernest Et Celestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Celestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: An organised running race is tragically interrupted by the death of a competitor. His race number identifies him as a prisoner taking part in a programme based on social reintegration through sport. But when his wife comes to identify the body, she is adamant that it is not her husband.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: The mystery thickens for Clarissa and Kelly: where is the prisoner in question, who is the dead man and who was the murderer's real target?

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: We plunge into the world and workshop of Nicolas Alquin to discover his creations, intended for the ''elle et le Chemin'' exhibition, in the church of Fontevraud Abbey.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: Stroll along the magical streets of Old Quebec to see the Bonhomme Carnaval, a true icon of winter in Quebec. There's no escaping the legendary Dufferin Terrace slide at the foot of the Château Frontenac. Ice canoeing on the St. Lawrence River and discovering the rich indigenous heritage...

programme.title: Stoemp, Peket... Et Des Rawettes
programme.desc: A veritable celebration of Belgium's regions, along with the locals who live there, their regional languages... and their humour!

programme.title: a Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'aBE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde
programme.desc: Justin Ramelot takes Adrien north of the Norwegian Arctic Circle. Here in the land of the Sami, blanketed in white for five months of the year, Justin runs a breeding kennels with 160 sled-dogs, with which he travels throughout Finnmark. An ultimate experience in search of the northern lights...

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Carte Aux Tresors
programme.desc: Heading for Tarn-et-Garonne. The game stretches from Auvillar to Saint-Antonin-Noble-Val via Moissac, Lauzerte, Montauban and Bruniquel. Contestants: Claire and Thomas.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 9
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Maria Makiling ep 2
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Sing Galing Season 3 Ep 28 (Semifinals)
programme.desc: Sing Galing is a Philippine videoke singing reality game show. The contestants must know the right lyrics to any randomly chosen song, be it Filipino or foreign, without going out of tune. If the contestant fails to sing the right lyrics and in tune, an animated genie would pop up on the screen and strike an animated gong to signal the end of the unfortunate aspirant's chance at instant wealth and glory.

programme.title: Masked Singer S3 ep 9 Part 1
programme.desc: New Season, new masked singers, exciting twists and triple the fun on the third season of Masked Singer Pilipinas

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 2
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 6
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 10
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 9
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 2
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: For the Love ep 2
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Astig
programme.desc: Two police informants assume tough personas to con money from small-time criminals. But all their wise-cracking pretense traps them to be part of a crime boss's major operations.

programme.title: Encounter ep 23
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 4
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?
